XXn1136u_001:2: nṛttaṃ gītaṃ vādyam iti trayaṃ 'nāṭyam' ityucyate;
XXn1136u_001:4: jarattamāryāḥ sāhityavidyāyā iva nāṭyavidyāyā api rasajñā babhūvuḥ |
XXn1136u_001:7: abhinavaguptācāryaḥ 4100 tamavarṣajīvī vistṛtām asya vivṛtiṃ viracitavān abhinavabhāratīṃ nāma ||
XXn1136u_001:9: ukte jātiniyame niraṅkuśam anuvartamāne gateṣu parassahastreṣu vatsareṣu kṣatriyā vīravṛttau vaiśyā vāṇijyavṛttau cāsaktāḥ santo vaidikeṣu yajñakarmasu brāhmaṇān prāyaḥ pratinidhātum ārebhire |
XXn1136u_001:14: brāhmaṇāśca vahavaḥ sulabhayā pūjayā saṃtṛptā vidyāpariśīlane yathāpūrvaṃ śraddhāṃ na babandhuḥ |
XXn1136u_001:15: evaṃ kṣīyamāṇe vidyāpracāre sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ vidyāmūlāḥ sadguṇā viralā āsan |
XXn1136u_001:16: krameṇa teṣāṃ parasparasnehaḥ samadṛṣṭitvaṃ 'cāturvarṇyam ekaṃ kuḍumbam' iti buddhiścāstaṃ jagāma |
XXn1136u_001:21: idaṃ mataṃ jātiniyamābhāvājjātiniyamakleśam anubhavatāṃ janānāṃ kārābandhamocanamiva mahad āśvāsasthānam abhavat |
XXn1136u_001:22: brāhmaṇā api kecit tatkāle guṇadarśanād matamidam aṅgīcakruḥ; kimutānye |
XXn1136u_001:34: tathā svarganarakau devāḥ punarjanma nirvāṇāparanāmā mokṣaśca mate'sminnabhyupagamyante |
XXn1136u_001:38: idaṃ mataṃ kalivarṣīyasya ṣaḍviṃśaśatakasyottarārdhe'ṅkuritaṃ bhikṣusaṅghasya mahatāṃ rājñāṃ ca prayatnād bhāratam akhilam ākramya cīneṣu jāpānadeśe laṅkāyāṃ ca pracāram alabhata |
XXn1136u_001:39: tad adhyatve bhārate paraṃ viralaṃ pracarati ||
XXn1136u_001:41: purā nepāleṣu kapilavastunagare śākyānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ vaṃśe śuddhodano nāma rājā babhūva |
XXn1136u_001:42: tasya cirāya santatim abhilaṣato māyādevyāṃ siddhārtho nāma sūnuḥ kalivarṣe 2544 tame'jāyata | ayaṃ vaṃśa- (81)
XXn1136u_001:46: saptame'hni mātrā viyuktam enaṃ mātṛṣvasā gautamī parivardhayāmāsa |
XXn1136u_001:47: ayam adhītavidyaḥ prāpte yauvane gopāṃ nāma śākyakanyakāṃ pariṇīya tasyāṃ rāhulābhidhaṃ putraṃ janayāmāsa |
XXn1136u_001:48: eṣa mānuṣabhogeṣvatidṛḍhayā naśvaratvabhāvanayā rājyabhogād virajya kvacana rātrau prasuptaśāntād antaḥpurāt pravavrāja |
XXn1136u_001:49: prathamaṃ girivrajam āsādya tatratyāsu guhāsu vasabhdyaḥ parivrājakebhya āryamatatattvāni samyag jagrāha |
XXn1136u_001:50: tāvatā svābhīṣṭaṃ sukham alabdhaṃ paśyan sa buddhagayāyāṃ ghoraṃ tapaścaritum ārebhe |
XXn1136u_001:51: tathā tapasyannayaṃ ṣaṭsu varṣeṣvatīteṣu kvasid dine śramātiśayād mūrcchito babhūva;
XXn1136u_001:52: kṣeṇena ca pratilabdhāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ tapaḥ parisamāpayāmāsa |
XXn1136u_001:53: atha phalgunīnadyāstīraṃ prāpya kasyāpi bodhidrumasya mūle yadāyaṃ niṣasāda,
XXn1136u_001:58: tato buddhaḥ kāśyām urubilve ca bahun śiṣyān avindata |
XXn1136u_001:59: saśiṣya eṣa vītarāgo muniḥ parārthaparāṇyavadātāni karmāṇyācaran guṇaikasārairupadeśairjanān jātibhedam anādṛtya tata itaḥ svamate praveśayāmāsa
XXn1136u_001:60: sa magadheṣu rājñā bimbisāreṇātivelaṃ pūjyamānaściram uvāsa |
XXn1136u_001:61: punarutsukasya piturdarśanāya kapilavastunagaraṃ gatvā svaputraṃ rāhulaṃ svamate prāveśayat |
XXn1136u_001:62: pitṛniryāṇāt parato mātṛṣvasāraṃ bhāryāṃ ca sa kāṣāyaṃ grāhayāmāsa |
XXn1136u_001:63: atha muniranapāyinīṃ kīrtti jagati pratiṣṭhāpya 2624 tame kalivarṣe nirvāṇaṃ prapede |
